author: KW Oktoberfest
flipSide: Parents bring their kids from all over KW for the Thanksgiving day parade. The echoes of children giggling and parents murmuring reverberate on this road.

imageName: Downtown Kitchener Ribfest & Craft Beer Show
author: Explore Waterloo Region
flipSide: Even during a pandemic, the city of Kitchener-Waterloo finds a way to come together. The scent of smoked pork lingers in the air with a hint of locally crafted beer.

imageName: Friends and Family Gathering to Play Hockey
author: Explore Waterloo Region
flipSide: Skates pierce over the ice. With each hit from hockey sticks, the puck speeds up it's rattling across the cold rough surface.

author: KW Multicultural Festival Org.
flipSide: People from all nationalities gather to show off their culture. Music from the stage near by can be heard in the background. All sorts of dishes ranging from Filipino to Polish is carefully prepared for people to try here.

author: 'huronheightss' Instagram
flipSide: Graduating students stand on bleachers shining their phones high to the melody of the song. The students in this picture are feeling the same complex salad of emotions Marina Keegan also stated during her graduation speech.

imageName: Huron Heights Students Raise $7,300 for local family
author: CBC Kitchener-Waterloo News
flipSide: Staff and students watch the Business Leadership class present the funds the school raised. An immense feeling of pride filled the air as everyone can proudly call themself a Husky for being apart of this.

imageName: Huron Heights Students Gather For Multicultural Day
author: @HHSSHuskies Twitter
flipSide: Students dress in all types of multicultural attire on the cafeteria stage to show representation for thier culture. Often times cheering can be heard from spectators in the cafeteria when they see someone representing their culture.
